title: Riot Points Buy
body: I bought 1350 Riot points on Amazon when I tried to put the code on the client, the code didn't work. I messaged Amazon and they told me to come here, so i was wondering if you can help me. My summoner name is Jinthesavage03

replies.body: That's interesting!  Did it say it was expired?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can help you out directly.  We'll see you there!
